meanings.definition: A circular movement or spinning motion.
meanings.sent1: The children watched the birlings of the spinning top.
meanings.sent2: The birlings of the carousel delighted the kids at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The birlings of the hula hoop made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The birlings of the tornado were mesmerizing yet terrifying.
meanings.sent5: The birlings of the ballerina's pirouette were graceful and elegant.

meanings.definition: The act of rotating or turning rapidly.
meanings.sent1: The sudden birlings of the dancer caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The birlings of the fan cooled the room quickly.
meanings.sent3: The birlings of the spinning top seemed almost magical.
meanings.sent4: The birlings of the propeller created a strong breeze.
meanings.sent5: The birlings of the tornado lifted everything in its path.

meanings.definition: A game or activity involving spinning or twirling.
meanings.sent1: The children played a game of birlings with the spinning top.
meanings.sent2: The birlings of the jump rope kept the kids entertained.
meanings.sent3: The birlings of the twirling baton amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The birlings of the yo-yo fascinated the onlookers.
meanings.sent5: The birlings of the merry-go-round brought joy to all the riders.
